name: More than a Pixel
description:
This was my first experience in a Game Jam alongside three other colleagues and it was also our entry for Ludum Dare 38, so please keep in mind that we only had 58 hours to do this. 

Like the title says, this game is more than what it seems. The theme for the Jam was "A small world", so i convinced my team to work in a different perspective.  

When we are kids, our room is our small world and through our imagination we take on amazing adventures! For our character, that's what a small world is, somewhere that he feels safe, somewhere that he feels like he's the hero. 

 < All the assets were done by us, except the free chiptunes that we used from https://opengameart.org/ >

João Soares (Me) - Main plot idea; Spaceman pixel suit design and animations; Game title; Level design; Concept for the mechanics and bosses. 

Pedro Teixeira - Programmed the game using Game Maker; Ninja design and animations; Level design and the ninja boss. 

João Ferreira - Drew the forest background; Drew the melee enemy & concept of the space boss.

Marcus Flor -  Drew the robot enemy; Tweaked space boss.
